Description.0: Our signature initiative funding helps Canadian cities and communities of all sizes study bold environmental projects that reduce GHG emissions and protect the air, water or land.
Description.1: We fund highly innovative and impactful environmental pilot projects that reduce GHG emissions and protect the air, water or land. This funding is designed for transformative, best-in-class projects.
Description.2: We fund highly innovative and impactful environmental capital projects that reduce GHG emissions and protect the air, water or land. This funding is designed for transformative, best-in-class projects.
